title: Cato Networks Events
description: This dashboard provides insights into Cato Networks events, including security, detection and response, connectivity, and system events.

definition.content:
This dashboard provides a comprehensive view of Cato Networks events, including security, detection and response, connectivity, and system events. It offers insights into event distribution by action, subtype, and threat type, as well as the top source IPs, their geolocations, and the top event domains, hosts, and users.

For more information, see the [Cato Networks Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/cato_networks/).

**Tips**:
 - Use the timeframe selector in the upper-right corner of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
 - Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify, and add widgets and visualizations.

This group provides a high-level overview of security events, including total event counts, trends over time, top events by action and sub-type, traffic direction, source and destination IPs with geolocation, and the most affected devices, applications, and users. It also highlights potential threats by type, risk level, and MITRE ATT&CK tactics and techniques.

This group provides a high-level view of detection and response events, highlighting total events, trends over time, top events by action and sub-type, source IPs with corresponding geolocation information, and the top affected devices, detected indications, and producers.

This group provides a high-level view of connectivity events, highlighting total events, trends over time, top events by action and sub-type, distribution by login type and authentication type, source IPs with corresponding geolocation information.
This group provides a high-level view of system events, highlighting total events, trends over time, top events by action and sub-type, top events, and top system users.
